article_title: Christie Aims GOP Work at N.J. Firms
article_text:
New Jersey companies and political consultants have benefited from Gov. Chris Christie's tenure as chairman of the Republican Governors Association, earning lucrative fees and gaining valuable exposure, according to a Wall Street Journal analysis.

Since Mr. Christie was named RGA chairman last November, the group's spending with New Jersey firms has topped $990,000 through June, higher than the amounts spent each year from 2010 to...
